act: Imperial War Graves Endowment Fund Act 1926
section_title: Incorporation of Trustees of Endowment Fund.
section_text: 1 The Trustees of the Endowment Fund shall be a body corporate by the name of the Imperial War Graves Endowment Fund Trustees with perpetual succession and a common seal.

act: Imperial War Graves Endowment Fund Act 1926
section_text: 2 Notwithstanding anything in the said Charter or in any Act, the Trustees of the Endowment Fund shall have power to accumulate in augmentation of the Fund any of the income produced by the Fund until the total amount of the Fund reaches the sum of five million pounds.

act: Imperial War Graves Endowment Fund Act 1926
section_text: 3 This Act may be cited as the Imperial War Graves Endowment Fund Act, 1926.
